Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg
A breeze blows by, taking the heat away while leaving behind the fragrance of the wildflowers.
You fan yourself with your terminal, but you cannot save yourself from the heat of the enormous object behind you.
It is a platform lift that goes from inside the building to the roof. Up there sits the detection device Babylonia installed.
They are normally hidden inside the building until they are awakened by threats.
Lee
There's no record of activation from the mainframe or the cooling system. What targeted our transport craft, then...?
Lee places the cover back onto the access panel, and the cooling system of the detection device finally runs again. The insufferable heat behind you gradually eases.
Mark the Great
Ah! You've knocked down my paints, Lee.
The awakened machine painting on the other side of the device raises his arms and protests.
Lee
I'm sorry, I didn't notice it... Can I do something to fix it?
Mark the Great
Hmm... That's not necessary for now. Mark the Great is capable of dealing with this.
The awakened machine adjusts his nozzle and once again initiates his assault on the device with his paints.
Half an hour ago, Lee and you were on a transport craft to Constellia to stop an unexpected riot.
However, you were targeted by the detection devices of the city when you were halfway there.
You ran into an awakened machine named "Mark the Great" nearby, but he said he had not seen anyone touching the detection device.
Are you sure this is the one?
Lee
I'm sure. Given what transpired then and where our craft was when it happened, this is the only detection device that could have been activated.
But there's no sign of activation.
Lee
Perhaps... the system was hacked, and they did a great job covering their trails.
Do you know where we should start looking?
Regardless of how they hack into the device, there has to be an entry point.
Lee
The device is connected to the network of Constellia. They would have entered there.
Lee
Our primary suspects are all Babylonia-deployed members in Constellia and... the mechanoids who have been living here.
Awakened machines. Don't forget.
Lee
Right. Awakened machines...
Lee pauses, seemingly not used to calling them this way.
Right then, you hear your colleagues calling from your comms.
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab
Engineering Force Captain
This is the Engineering Force. The air defense system doesn't seem to have been activated or accessed.
Understood. Thanks for the hard work.
Engineering Force Crew

We shouldn't connect the detection devices to the mechanoids' network, I reckon. The Diplomatic Court was too charitable when they did it as a gesture of goodwill. What a joke! Now, it's coming back to bite us.
Engineering Force Captain
It's a minor incident. Just follow the order from the headquarters.
Engineering Force Captain
Not to mention that the launcher of the air defense system is still in our hands...
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab
Mark the Great
Done.
An excited voice interrupts your trails of thoughts. You turn around to see Mark, the awakened machine, gesturing for you to go over.
Mark the Great
Mark the Great has decided to name this piece "Gazing into the Distance".
You and Lee walk to the side of the detection device to find the flat armor plate transformed into a canvas for graffiti.
A small mechanoid stands on a short wall, flanked by a human and a Construct standing by his side.
The human and Construct lean close to each other, each showing half of their faces while gazing into the distance through the head of the mechanoid as if using a telescope.
Not bad.
Lee
I agree. But the three... characters in your painting seem familiar.
(Remembering when you first met...)
DialogEnable
Hey!
Lee
Awakened Machine
The mechanoid with short hair and highlights, wearing black and white with a little red and blue, whose figure looks like a half-polished marble statue.
Lee
...What can I do for you, the bipedal mechanoid in gray who looks like a foldable storage rack equipped with spray paint?
Awakened Machine
Do you know if any workshop is still running around here? I want to perform a major check-up on my movement module.
Lee
A workshop that is still running... I can't believe how neglected the facilities in this city are.
Lee
The bipedal mechanoid in gray equipped with spray paint...
Awakened Machine
It's Mark. Mark the Great. Don't say my alias so seriously as if casting a spell or something...
Lee
My apologies. I thought this is how you call each other here...
Awakened Machine
How come a mechanoid like you don't pay attention to machine etiquette? You only use each other's alias once... Hold on.
Awakened Machine
What's wrong with this human? Why is your companion circling Mark like that...
Awakened Machine
Did I trigger some predatory instincts? Mark is inedible, unfortunately.
Lee
So this is the form you wish to take, Mark?
Isn't that a little too small?
And why is your movement module a caterpillar tread now...?
How would you climb short walls now?
Mark the Great
It's my artistic expression! Artistic expression! You have to interpret it! Interpret it!
Mark the Great
How can a human like you be so artistically inadequate?
Haha...
But this device does not really match with art, Mark...
After the detection device is connected to the Constellia network, it can be used to target anything inside the city.
The air defense system it is connected to is simply better at defending the sky, but it does not need to be.
Lee
There's nothing else to find here, Commandant.
Lee dusts off his hands and gives you back your personal terminal.
Let's move on to our next mission, then.
Lee
Speaking of which... How's the "war" going?
Mark the Great
The war? We Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists are winning, obviously.
Lee
Is that so? Let's focus on the Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists, then.
Lee looks to you for confirmation before turning around and heading for the control panel of the platform lift.
Mark the Great
You said you'd be fair! Don't you just target us Multidimensional Mechanical Cubists!
